author: avonwyss
description: Execute sequences for a selection of plants

config.name: query
config.label: Plants query, use a Python dictionary {'key':'value',...}

config.name: save_metadata
config.label: Metadata to set, use a Python dictionary {'key':'value',...}

config.name: travel_height
config.label: Maximal Y-axis position acceptable when moving

config.name: init
config.label: Name of sequence to execute for initialization

config.name: before
config.label: Name of sequence to execute before moving to a plant

config.name: after
config.label: Name of sequence to execute after moving to a plant

config.name: end
config.label: Name of sequence to execute for finalization

config.name: offset_x
config.label: X-axis offset to apply to plant coordinate when moving to a plant

config.name: offset_y
config.label: Y-axis offset to apply to plant coordinate when moving to a plant
